typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Store_Code as integer,
		Store_Name as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		Compartment as string,
		SubCompartment as string,
		TYPE as string,
		nick_name as string,
		prod_code as string,
		NetSold_Qty as short,
		Cost as string,
		Retail_Price as string,
		Unit_Price_Sold as string,
		FinalPrice as boolean,
		CONCESSION_ID as integer,
		CONCESSION_Code as string,
		New_Price_After_Discount as string,
		CONCESSION_Description as string,
		Amount_Discount as string,
		Percent_Discount as double,
		NetSold_Amount as string,
		TAX_RATE as double,
		TAX_AMOUNT1 as double,
		TAX_AMOUNT2 as double,
		emp_code as string,
		Emp_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVSource
source(output(
		GRP_ID as integer,
		GRP_NAME as string,
		SECTION as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhdb
dwhdb derive(dimhash = sha1(GRP_NAME+ SECTION)) ~> createHash
CreateHashNewData, createHash exists(newdatahash == dimhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, dwhdb lookup(toString(Compartment) == GRP_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(GRP_NAME = Compartment,
		SECTION = SubCompartment,
		{_inserted_dt} = iif(isNull(GRP_ID) ,  currentTimestamp(), {_inserted_dt}),
		{_updated_dt} = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttrributes
SetAttrributes aggregate(groupBy(SECTION,
		GRP_NAME,
		GRP_ID,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}),
	count = count(SECTION)) ~> Aggregate1
CSVSource derive(newdatahash = sha1(Compartment + SubCompartment)) ~> CreateHashNewData
Aggregate1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(GRP_ID)),
	updateIf(not(isNull(GRP_ID)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		GRP_ID as integer,
		GRP_NAME as string,
		SECTION as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['GRP_NAME'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SECTION,
		GRP_NAME,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Store_Code as integer,
		Store_Name as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		Compartment as string,
		SubCompartment as string,
		TYPE as string,
		nick_name as string,
		prod_code as string,
		NetSold_Qty as short,
		Cost as string,
		Retail_Price as string,
		Unit_Price_Sold as string,
		FinalPrice as boolean,
		CONCESSION_ID as integer,
		CONCESSION_Code as string,
		New_Price_After_Discount as string,
		CONCESSION_Description as string,
		Amount_Discount as string,
		Percent_Discount as double,
		NetSold_Amount as string,
		TAX_RATE as double,
		TAX_AMOUNT1 as double,
		TAX_AMOUNT2 as double,
		emp_code as string,
		Emp_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVSource
source(output(
		CONS_ID as integer,
		CONS_CODE as string,
		CONS_DESCRIPTION as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhdb
dwhdb derive(dimhash = sha1(CONS_CODE+ CONS_DESCRIPTION)) ~> createHash
CreateHashNewData, createHash exists(newdatahash == dimhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, dwhdb lookup(CONCESSION_Code == CONS_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(CONS_CODE = CONCESSION_Code,
		CONS_DESCRIPTION = CONCESSION_Description,
		{_inserted_dt} = iif(isNull(CONS_ID) ,  currentTimestamp(), {_inserted_dt}),
		{_updated_dt} = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttrributes
SetAttrributes aggregate(groupBy(CONS_DESCRIPTION,
		CONS_CODE,
		CONS_ID,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}),
	count = count(CONS_DESCRIPTION)) ~> Aggregate1
CSVSource derive(newdatahash = sha1(CONCESSION_Code + CONCESSION_Description)) ~> CreateHashNewData
Aggregate1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(CONS_ID)),
	updateIf(not(isNull(CONS_ID)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CONS_ID as integer,
		CONS_CODE as string,
		CONS_DESCRIPTION as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CONS_CODE'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CONS_DESCRIPTION,
		CONS_CODE,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Store_Code as integer,
		Store_Name as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		Compartment as string,

source(output(
		EMP_ID as integer,
		EMP_CODE as string,
		EMP_NAME as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhdb
dwhdb derive(dimhash = sha1(EMP_CODE+EMP_NAME)) ~> createHash
CreateHashNewData, createHash exists(newdatahash == dimhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, dwhdb lookup(CSVSource@emp_code == dwhdb@EMP_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(EMP_CODE = CSVSource@emp_code,
		EMP_NAME = CSVSource@Emp_Name,
		{_inserted_dt} = iif(isNull(EMP_ID) ,  currentTimestamp(), {_inserted_dt}),
		{_updated_dt} = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttrributes
SetAttrributes aggregate(groupBy(SetAttrributes@EMP_NAME,
		SetAttrributes@EMP_CODE,
		EMP_ID,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}),
	count = count(SetAttrributes@EMP_NAME)) ~> Aggregate1
CSVSource derive(newdatahash = sha1(emp_code + Emp_Name)) ~> CreateHashNewData
Aggregate1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(EMP_ID)),
	updateIf(not(isNull(EMP_ID)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EMP_ID as integer,
		EMP_CODE as string,
		EMP_NAME as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EMP_CODE'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		EMP_CODE = EMP_NAME,
		EMP_NAME = EMP_CODE,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Store_Code as integer,
		Store_Name as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		Compartment as string,
		SubCompartment as string,
		TYPE as string,
		nick_name as string,
		prod_code as string,
		NetSold_Qty as short,
		Cost as string,
		Retail_Price as string,
		Unit_Price_Sold as string,
		FinalPrice as boolean,
		CONCESSION_ID as integer,
		CONCESSION_Code as string,
		New_Price_After_Discount as string,
		CONCESSION_Description as string,
		Amount_Discount as string,
		Percent_Discount as double,
		NetSold_Amount as string,
		TAX_RATE as double,
		TAX_AMOUNT1 as double,
		TAX_AMOUNT2 as double,
		emp_code as string,
		Emp_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVSource
source(output(
		PROD_ID as integer,
		PROD_TYPE as string,
		PROD_NAME as string,
		PROD_CODE as string,
		LABEL_NAME as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhdb
dwhdb derive(dimhash = sha1(PROD_NAME+ PROD_CODE)) ~> createHash
CreateHashNewData, createHash exists(newdatahash == dimhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, dwhdb lookup(toString(CSVSource@prod_code) == dwhdb@PROD_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(PROD_CODE = CSVSource@prod_code,
		PROD_NAME = nick_name,
		PROD_TYPE = TYPE,
		{_updated_dt} = currentTimestamp(),
		LABEL_NAME = COMPANY,
		{_inserted_dt} = iif(isNull(PROD_ID) ,  currentTimestamp(), {_inserted_dt})) ~> SetAttrributes
SetAttrributes aggregate(groupBy(PROD_ID,
		PROD_TYPE,
		PROD_NAME,
		SetAttrributes@PROD_CODE,
		LABEL_NAME,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}),
	count = count(SetAttrributes@PROD_CODE)) ~> Aggregate1
CSVSource derive(newdatahash = sha1(nick_name+ toString(prod_code))) ~> CreateHashNewData
Aggregate1 alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(PROD_ID))),
	insertIf(isNull(PROD_ID))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PROD_ID as integer,
		PROD_TYPE as string,
		PROD_NAME as string,
		PROD_CODE as string,
		LABEL_NAME as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['PROD_NAME'],
	format: 'table',
	stagingSchemaName: 'sales',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PROD_NAME,
		PROD_TYPE,
		PROD_CODE,
		LABEL_NAME,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		COMPANY as string,
		Shop_Code as integer,
		Shop_Name as string,
		Compartment as string,
		SubCompartment as string,
		TYPE as string,
		nick_name as string,
		prod_code as string,
		quantity as short,
		CST as string,
		Price as string,
		Unit_Price as string,
		CONCESSION_ID as integer,
		CONCESSION_Code as string,
		Price_Reduced as string,
		CONCESSION_Description as string,
		Concession as string,
		Percent_Reduce as double,
		Amount as string,
		TAX_SLAB as double,
		TAXES1 as double,
		TAXES2 as double,
		emp_code as string,
		Emp_Name as string,
		TRANSDATE as long,
		TRANSTIME as integer,
		TRANSNUM as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVSource
source(output(
		POS_ID as integer,
		POS_CODE as string,
		POS_LABEL as string,
		DISTRICT as string,
		BLOCK as string,
		REGION as string,
		TIER as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ShopDim
source(output(
		EMP_ID as integer,
		EMP_CODE as string,
		EMP_NAME as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmployeeDim
source(output(
		PROD_ID as integer,
		PROD_TYPE as string,
		PROD_NAME as string,
		PROD_CODE as string,
		LABEL_NAME as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductDim
source(output(
		GRP_ID as integer,
		GRP_NAME as string,
		SECTION as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> GroupDim
source(output(
		CONS_ID as integer,
		CONS_CODE as string,
		CONS_DESCRIPTION as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ConcessionDim
CSVSource, ShopDim lookup(toString(Shop_Code) == POS_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupShop
LookupConcession derive(POS_ID = POS_ID,
		EMP_ID = EMP_ID,
		{_inserted_dt} = currentTimestamp(),
		CONCESSION_ID = CONS_ID,
		GRP_ID = GRP_ID,
		PROD_ID = PROD_ID,
		Quantity = quantity,
		CST = CST,
		Unit_Price = Unit_Price,
		Price = Price,
		Amount = Amount,
		TRANSDATETIME = toTimestamp(TRANSDATE),
		TRANSTIME = TRANSTIME,
		TRANSNUM = TRANSNUM,
		TAXES1 = TAXES1,
		TAXES2 = TAXES2,
		TAX_SLAB = TAX_SLAB) ~> SetAttrributes
LookupShop, EmployeeDim lookup(CSVSource@emp_code == EmployeeDim@EMP_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEmployee
LookupEmployee, ProductDim lookup(CSVSource@prod_code == ProductDim@PROD_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProduct
LookupProduct, GroupDim lookup(Compartment == GRP_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupGroup
LookupGroup, ConcessionDim lookup(CONCESSION_Code == CONS_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupConcession
SetAttrributes sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat(concat('sales-',concat(concat(concat(concat (toString(dayOfMonth(  currentUTC('GMT'))) , '-' ),  toString(month(currentUTC('GMT')))), '-'), toString( year(currentUTC('GMT'))))), '.csv'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		EMP_ID,
		{_inserted_dt},
		CONS_ID = CONCESSION_ID,
		GRP_ID,
		PROD_ID,
		Quantity,
		Cost = CST,
		Unit_Price,
		Price,
		Amount,
		TRANSDATETIME,
		TRANSTIME,
		TRANSNUM,
		TAXES1,
		TAXES2,
		TAX_SLAB,
		POS_ID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinksalesblob

CreateHashNewData, createHash exists(newdatahash == dimhash,

Exists1, dwhdb lookup(toString(Shop_Code) == POS_CODE,

Lookup1 derive(POS_LABEL = Shop_Name,
		POS_CODE = Shop_Code,
		{_inserted_dt} = iif(isNull(POS_ID) ,  currentTimestamp(), {_inserted_dt}),

Aggregate1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(POS_ID)),
	updateIf(not(isNull(POS_ID)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		POS_ID as integer,
		POS_CODE as string,
		POS_LABEL as string,
		DISTRICT as string,
		BLOCK as string,
		REGION as string,
		TIER as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		POS_CODE,
		POS_LABEL,
